DOC.brief_summary: The clinical study determines the safety and efficacy of MK0431 in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus who have inadequate glycemic control on pioglitazone as monotherapy.
DOC.brief_title: MK0431 (Sitagliptin) Pioglitazone Add-on Study for Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus (0431-055)(COMPLETED)
